merata gabada palana anshaye thawath idiri piyawarak lesa nawina gabada sankirna thunak idikirima sandaha spanynya rajaya sahana naya mudalak laba dima gowi ha wyaparika prajawa lada jayagrahanayak bawa nagarika sanwardhana ha puja bhumi sanwardhana amathi dinesh gunawardhana mahatha pawasiya.kabinat mandalaye anumathiya laba ganimen anathuruwa galewela, hambanthota, dambaulla yana pradeshawala ema nawina gabada sankirna idi kirima wenuwen spanynya rajaya yuro miliyana 47k laba dimata ekangathawaya pala kala bawath, ee anuwa erata globaltek samagama samanga awabodhatha giwisumakata elambaimata thiranaya kala bawath amathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.hethema me adahas palakale global tek samagama samanga ema awabodhatha giwisumata pasugiyada (18) sethsiripayedi athsan thabu awasthawedi ya.mema naya mudalen yuro miliyana 12.5k pamana aayojanaya karamin hambanthota nawina gabada sankirnaye wada aarambha kirimata niyamithaya.

boho wu lawana jalaya thana sulakin hunukota gatha nohakka se, mukhayen krarawu basbinum asanna wu sath purushaya ge chiththa swabhawaya wikarayata pamunuwagatha nohakke yayi yanu abhiprayayi. 2010-09-06 boho demawpiyan thama du daruwan ge aadara mul aadara sambandhatha desa balanne owun jiwithaye gatha kota athi kalayath samanga sansandanathmakawa wiya haka.
